Lost or stolen card?: Don’t worry, we’ve got it under control. Call 1-800-MASTERCARD (1-800-627-8372) in the U.S.
Explore card benefits: Shopping protection, savings and assistance are just some of the many ways using a Mastercard can help you
Reload a prepaid card: Simply load and use your card wherever Debit Mastercard is accepted
Identity Theft Alerts: Help safeguard your personal information online with this free benefit for Mastercard cardholders
Direct Express App: If you have a Direct Express® Debit Mastercard®, download this app for a convenient and safe way to access details on account activity, find ATM locations and get information about the many ways to use the card.
